name: Human
description: The default starting race. Humans are adaptable and well-rounded, offering modest bonuses to experience and luck.

name: Elf
description: Elves are graceful beings with enhanced luck and stamina, making them excellent for exploration and mining.

name: Zombie
description: Zombies are undead creatures with regenerative abilities, supporting a sustain-focused playstyle.

name: Goblin
description: Goblins are small, greedy creatures that excel at gathering gold and finding rare loot.

name: Undead
description: The Undead are powerful but fragile, trading health for increased damage and mobility.

name: Dwarf
description: Dwarves are master miners with exceptional luck and defensive capabilities.

name: Shadow
description: Shadows are elusive fighters with high evasion and attack speed, perfect for aggressive playstyles.

name: Minotaur

abilities.Bull's Fury: When HP is below 50%, gain +30% Movement Speed and +30% Physical Damage

description: Minotaurs are massive warriors that become more dangerous when wounded, perfect for tank builds.

name: Dragonborn

abilities.Dragon's Fire: 25% chance to deal +30% fire damage on hit

description: Dragonborn are powerful dragon-human hybrids with fire abilities and exceptional defense.

name: Angel

abilities.Wings: -20% Dash Cooldown, +50% Dash Distance, +15% Longer Dash IFrame, +20% Movement Speed, +25% Jump Boost, +20% Stamina
abilities.Smite: 50% chance to call upon Smite on-hit for 30% of physical damage
abilities.Holy Hand: Have infinite stamina while below 20% health

description: Angels are divine beings with incredible mobility, luck, and powerful smite abilities.

name: Demon

abilities.Demonic Powers: +20% Movement Speed, +20% Attack Speed, +20% Physical Damage, +20% Stronger Fire Damage, +30% Height, +10% Width & Depth
abilities.Backfire: 25% chance to burn the enemy when damage is taken
abilities.Cursed Aura: While in combat, have a small area around you that deals 10% damage of your weapon per second
abilities.Devil's Finger: When you dash, teleport with hellfire particles and have 35% chance to create a hellfire circle dealing 45% of your weapon damage per second for 3 seconds

description: Demons are fearsome beings with overwhelming offensive power and hellfire abilities.
